name: The Suspect: Prison Break
description:
Join the ultimate prison break adventure in "The Suspect: Prison Break"!
It's up to you to plan and execute a daring escape from the prison you're locked up in.
Build and manage your own prison as you rise to the top of the underworld and take on rival gangs and cartels in an immersive, story-driven game.

In this prison tycoon simulator, you'll use war strategy and empire building to expand your power and wealth. Every episode and chapter presents new challenges as you work to become the ultimate prison boss. As you progress through the game, the choices you make will shape your story and determine your fate.

With a role-playing experience, you will have the opportunity to choose your own story and adventure. You have the power to shape your own empire and become the most powerful mob boss in the city. Rich graphics and an interactive story will make you feel like you are in a real crime city and living in the underworld.

Experience the thrill of outsmarting the guards and making a daring escape in "The Suspect: Prison Break".
Download "The Suspect: Prison Break" now and start your journey to the top of the criminal empire!

FEATURES:
- Intense survival gameplay: Survive life in prison and plan your escape in a challenging and immersive environment
- Choose your own story and adventure with role-playing elements
- Build your own prison empire: Become a prison tycoon and rise through the ranks to become the boss
- Navigate the dangerous underworld: Deal with rival mobs and warring factions as you make your way to freedom
- Outsmart the justice system and the mafia: Avoid detection and evade capture as you try to escape
- Experience a variety of environments: Explore different locations within the prison, including cells, yards, and workshops
- Strategy-based gameplay: Use your brains and brawn to overcome challenges and make your way to freedom
